item.title: c3
item.description: The c3 package is a wrapper, or htmlwidget, for the C3 javascript charting library by Masayuki Tanaka. You will find this package useful if you are wanting to create a chart using R and embedding it in a Rmarkdown document or Shiny App. The C3 library is very versatile and includes a lot of options. Currently this package wraps most of the C3 options object.
